subject: Implement Background Jobs System
description:
Create job queue and worker system:
1. Create /home/ken/developer-portal/src/lib/jobs/queue.ts for job queue management
2. Create /home/ken/developer-portal/src/lib/jobs/worker.ts for background job processing
3. Implement job types: provision_project, rotate_key, deliver_webhook, export_backup, check_usage_limits, auto_suspend
4. Add retry logic with exponential backoff
5. Create API endpoint for job status checking
6. Add UI for monitoring job progress

Job types should support: pending → running → success/failed states with retry tracking.
